# id

**Instance Property**

A unique id for this tool output.

## Declaration

```swift
var id: String
```

## Inspecting a tool output

- **segments**: Segments of the tool output.
- **toolName**: The name of the tool that produced this output.

items.description: The name of the tool that produced this output.
items.name: toolName
